xml.title: Mobile Super Bunny Breakout Daily Dashboard - $date
xml.description:
This report provides daily stats for SBB Free and SBB Paid. The daily stats are as follows:
o DAU o Installs o Sessions and session length o MAU o Engagement o D1, D7, D30 Retention o Free to paid conversion
The report shows day on day (DoD) and week on week (WoW) % changes as well as 30 day trends.
NOTE: Same Day Conversion reports users who install the Free and Paid version on the same day. NOTE: Next Day and Day Three conversion reports users installing the paid version 1 and 3 days after installing the free version respectively. NOTE: The first set of tables shows SBB Free and Paid overall, the next set of tables breaks down each game. NOTE: MAU and Retention metric are calculated from tracked events and may not reflect true monthly user counts or installs. NOTE: Revenue is gross and unadjusted for Apple and Zynga revenue share as well as development and recoupment costs.

query.name: overalldailystats
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Overall 30 Day Stats Trends

query.name: overallsummary
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Overall Daily Summary

xml.query: select 'DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='dau' group by 1 union select 'Installs' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='installs' group by 1 union select 'Sessions' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='sessions' group by 1 union select 'Med Session Length' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='sessionlen' group by 1 union select 'MAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='mau' group by 1 union select 'Revenue' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),2)) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='revenue' group by 1 union select 'Revenue/DAU' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),3)) as Value, concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric in('revenue','dau') group by 1 order by 1 ;

query.name: overallretention
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Overall 30 Day Retention Trends

query.name: freedailystats
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Free 30 Day Stats Trends

xml.query: select stat_date as Date, max(a.dau) as DAU, max(a.installs) as Installs, max(a.mau) as MAU, max(a.engagement) as Engagement, max(a.revenue) as Revenue, max(a.units) as Units, sum(b.dau)/(30) as Avg_DAU, sum(b.installs)/(30) as Avg_Installs, sum(b.mau)/(30) as Avg_MAU, max(b.engagement) as Avg_Engagement, sum(b.revenue)/(30) as Avg_Revenue, sum(b.units)/(30) as Avg_Units from ( select stat_date, sum(case when metric='dau' then value else 0 end) as dau, sum(case when metric='installs' then value else 0 end) as installs, sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as mau, 100*sum(case when metric='7dau' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as engagement, sum(case when metric='revenue' then value else 0 end) as revenue, sum(case when metric='units' then value else 0 end) as units from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where stat_date between date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 30 day) and date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) and game_id=24 group by 1 ) a, ( select sum(case when metric='dau' then value else 0 end) as dau, sum(case when metric='installs' then value else 0 end) as installs, sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as mau, 100*sum(case when metric='7dau' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as engagement, sum(case when metric='revenue' then value else 0 end) as revenue, sum(case when metric='units' then value else 0 end) as units from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where stat_date between date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 30 day) and date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) and game_id=24 ) b group by 1 order by 1 ;

query.name: freesummary
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Free Daily Summary

xml.query: select 'DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='dau' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'Installs' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='installs' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'Sessions' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='sessions' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'Med Session Length' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='sessionlen' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'MAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='mau' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'Revenue' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),2)) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric='revenue' and game_id=24 group by 1 union select 'Revenue/DAU' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end),3)) as Value, concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 7 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where metric in('revenue','dau') and game_id=24 group by 1 order by 1 ;

query.name: freeretention
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Free 30 Day Retention Trends

xml.query: SELECT install_date as "Install Date", users as Installs, day1 *100.0 / users as "D1%", #day2 *100.0 / users as "D2%", #day3 *100.0 / users as "D3%", #day4 *100.0 / users as "D4%", #day5 *100.0 / users as "D5%", #day6 *100.0 / users as "D6%", day7 *100.0 / users as "D7%", #day8 *100.0 / users as "D8%", #day9 *100.0 / users as "D9%", #day10 *100.0 / users as "D10%", #day11 *100.0 / users as "D11%", #day12 *100.0 / users as "D12%", #day13 *100.0 / users as "D13%", day14 *100.0 / users as "D14%", #day15 *100.0 / users as "D15%", #day16 *100.0 / users as "D16%", #day17 *100.0 / users as "D17%", #day18 *100.0 / users as "D18%", #day19 *100.0 / users as "D19%", #day20 *100.0 / users as "D20%", #day21 *100.0 / users as "D21%", #day22 *100.0 / users as "D22%", #day23 *100.0 / users as "D23%", #day24 *100.0 / users as "D24%", #day25 *100.0 / users as "D25%", #day26 *100.0 / users as "D26%", #day27 *100.0 / users as "D27%", #day28 *100.0 / users as "D28%", #day29 *100.0 / users as "D29%", day30 *100.0 / users as "D30%", day1, #day2, #day3, #day4, #day5, #day6, day7, #day8, #day9, #day10, #day11, #day12, #day13, day14, #day15, #day16, #day17, #day18, #day19, #day20, #day21, #day22, #day23, #day24, #day25, #day26, #day27, #day28, #day29, day30 FROM ( SELECT install_date, sum(case when ddiff=0 or ddiff is null then cnt else 0 end) users, sum(case when ddiff = 1 then cnt else 0 end) day1, sum(case when ddiff = 2 then cnt else 0 end) day2, sum(case when ddiff = 3 then cnt else 0 end) day3, sum(case when ddiff = 4 then cnt else 0 end) day4, sum(case when ddiff = 5 then cnt else 0 end) day5, sum(case when ddiff = 6 then cnt else 0 end) day6, sum(case when ddiff = 7 then cnt else 0 end) day7, sum(case when ddiff = 8 then cnt else 0 end) day8, sum(case when ddiff = 9 then cnt else 0 end) day9, sum(case when ddiff = 10 then cnt else 0 end) day10, sum(case when ddiff = 11 then cnt else 0 end) day11, sum(case when ddiff = 12 then cnt else 0 end) day12, sum(case when ddiff = 13 then cnt else 0 end) day13, sum(case when ddiff = 14 then cnt else 0 end) day14, sum(case when ddiff = 15 then cnt else 0 end) day15, sum(case when ddiff = 16 then cnt else 0 end) day16, sum(case when ddiff = 17 then cnt else 0 end) day17, sum(case when ddiff = 18 then cnt else 0 end) day18, sum(case when ddiff = 19 then cnt else 0 end) day19, sum(case when ddiff = 20 then cnt else 0 end) day20, sum(case when ddiff = 21 then cnt else 0 end) day21, sum(case when ddiff = 22 then cnt else 0 end) day22, sum(case when ddiff = 23 then cnt else 0 end) day23, sum(case when ddiff = 24 then cnt else 0 end) day24, sum(case when ddiff = 25 then cnt else 0 end) day25, sum(case when ddiff = 26 then cnt else 0 end) day26, sum(case when ddiff = 27 then cnt else 0 end) day27, sum(case when ddiff = 28 then cnt else 0 end) day28, sum(case when ddiff = 29 then cnt else 0 end) day29, sum(case when ddiff = 30 then cnt else 0 end) day30 FROM tmp.retention_summary_sbb_daily_dash where game_id=24 GROUP BY install_date ) a ORDER BY install_date desc;

query.name: paiddailystats
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Paid 30 Day Stats Trends

xml.query: select stat_date as Date, max(a.dau) as DAU, max(a.installs) as Installs, max(a.mau) as MAU, max(a.engagement) as Engagement, max(a.revenue) as Revenue, max(a.units) as Units, sum(b.dau)/(30) as Avg_DAU, sum(b.installs)/(30) as Avg_Installs, sum(b.mau)/(30) as Avg_MAU, max(b.engagement) as Avg_Engagement, sum(b.revenue)/(30) as Avg_Revenue, sum(b.units)/(30) as Avg_Units from ( select stat_date, sum(case when metric='dau' then value else 0 end) as dau, sum(case when metric='installs' then value else 0 end) as installs, sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as mau, 100*sum(case when metric='7dau' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as engagement, sum(case when metric='revenue' then value else 0 end) as revenue, sum(case when metric='units' then value else 0 end) as units from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where stat_date between date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 30 day) and date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) and game_id=21 group by 1 ) a, ( select sum(case when metric='dau' then value else 0 end) as dau, sum(case when metric='installs' then value else 0 end) as installs, sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as mau, 100*sum(case when metric='7dau' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='mau' then value else 0 end) as engagement, sum(case when metric='revenue' then value else 0 end) as revenue, sum(case when metric='units' then value else 0 end) as units from tmp.a_metrics_sbb_daily_dash where stat_date between date_sub(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day), interval 30 day) and date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) and game_id=21 ) b group by 1 order by 1 ;

query.name: paidsummary
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Paid Overall Daily Summary

query.name: paidretention
query.title: Super Bunny Breakout Paid 30 Day Retention Trends

xml.query: SELECT install_date as "Install Date", users as Installs, day1 *100.0 / users as "D1%", #day2 *100.0 / users as "D2%", #day3 *100.0 / users as "D3%", #day4 *100.0 / users as "D4%", #day5 *100.0 / users as "D5%", #day6 *100.0 / users as "D6%", day7 *100.0 / users as "D7%", #day8 *100.0 / users as "D8%", #day9 *100.0 / users as "D9%", #day10 *100.0 / users as "D10%", #day11 *100.0 / users as "D11%", #day12 *100.0 / users as "D12%", #day13 *100.0 / users as "D13%", day14 *100.0 / users as "D14%", #day15 *100.0 / users as "D15%", #day16 *100.0 / users as "D16%", #day17 *100.0 / users as "D17%", #day18 *100.0 / users as "D18%", #day19 *100.0 / users as "D19%", #day20 *100.0 / users as "D20%", #day21 *100.0 / users as "D21%", #day22 *100.0 / users as "D22%", #day23 *100.0 / users as "D23%", #day24 *100.0 / users as "D24%", #day25 *100.0 / users as "D25%", #day26 *100.0 / users as "D26%", #day27 *100.0 / users as "D27%", #day28 *100.0 / users as "D28%", #day29 *100.0 / users as "D29%", day30 *100.0 / users as "D30%", day1, #day2, #day3, #day4, #day5, #day6, day7, #day8, #day9, #day10, #day11, #day12, #day13, day14, #day15, #day16, #day17, #day18, #day19, #day20, #day21, #day22, #day23, #day24, #day25, #day26, #day27, #day28, #day29, day30 FROM ( SELECT install_date, sum(case when ddiff=0 or ddiff is null then cnt else 0 end) users, sum(case when ddiff = 1 then cnt else 0 end) day1, sum(case when ddiff = 2 then cnt else 0 end) day2, sum(case when ddiff = 3 then cnt else 0 end) day3, sum(case when ddiff = 4 then cnt else 0 end) day4, sum(case when ddiff = 5 then cnt else 0 end) day5, sum(case when ddiff = 6 then cnt else 0 end) day6, sum(case when ddiff = 7 then cnt else 0 end) day7, sum(case when ddiff = 8 then cnt else 0 end) day8, sum(case when ddiff = 9 then cnt else 0 end) day9, sum(case when ddiff = 10 then cnt else 0 end) day10, sum(case when ddiff = 11 then cnt else 0 end) day11, sum(case when ddiff = 12 then cnt else 0 end) day12, sum(case when ddiff = 13 then cnt else 0 end) day13, sum(case when ddiff = 14 then cnt else 0 end) day14, sum(case when ddiff = 15 then cnt else 0 end) day15, sum(case when ddiff = 16 then cnt else 0 end) day16, sum(case when ddiff = 17 then cnt else 0 end) day17, sum(case when ddiff = 18 then cnt else 0 end) day18, sum(case when ddiff = 19 then cnt else 0 end) day19, sum(case when ddiff = 20 then cnt else 0 end) day20, sum(case when ddiff = 21 then cnt else 0 end) day21, sum(case when ddiff = 22 then cnt else 0 end) day22, sum(case when ddiff = 23 then cnt else 0 end) day23, sum(case when ddiff = 24 then cnt else 0 end) day24, sum(case when ddiff = 25 then cnt else 0 end) day25, sum(case when ddiff = 26 then cnt else 0 end) day26, sum(case when ddiff = 27 then cnt else 0 end) day27, sum(case when ddiff = 28 then cnt else 0 end) day28, sum(case when ddiff = 29 then cnt else 0 end) day29, sum(case when ddiff = 30 then cnt else 0 end) day30 FROM tmp.retention_summary_sbb_daily_dash where game_id=21 GROUP BY install_date ) a ORDER BY install_date desc;
